aircraft.value: Sentinel-15 - AC-8350-310 at Central Command Hub

defect_observed.value: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 06/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/01/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 09/01/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 09/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 14/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
